text:
It would be awesome if we could we get dependencies on the API for Module and Files. Right now there's no way I know of to find where files or modules are being used via the API, or to check if a file is in use at all.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/files>
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/cms/modules>
